ode::ODEWorld Class Reference
[Physics simulation support library (ODE C++ wrapper)]

#include <ODEWorld.h>

Inheritance diagram for ode::ODEWorld:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Simple wrapper which combines ODE simulation world and collision space.


Public Member Functions

dJointGroupID contacts () const
 Returns contact group using in collision detection.
int enabledBodies () const
 Returns number of enabled bodies in the simulation.
 ODEWorld (float groundlevel=-100.f)
 Creates simulation world, collision space and contact group, using default settings (gravity 9.8 m/s2, etc.).

 Sets gravity in simulation world.

 Returns collision space.

 Simulates time step.

 Returns simulation world.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ode::ODEWorld::ODEWorld (  float  groundlevel = -100.f  )  [explicit]
 

Creates simulation world, collision space and contact group, using default settings (gravity 9.8 m/s2, etc.).

Parameters:
groundlevel Absolute minimum Y-coordinate which limits free falls.

Member Function Documentation

int ode::ODEWorld::enabledBodies (   )  const
 

Returns number of enabled bodies in the simulation.

Good for performance tuning, as number of simultaneous enabled bodies should be low for best performance.

void ode::ODEWorld::setGravity (  const math::float3 &  f  ) 
 

Sets gravity in simulation world.

Default is -9.8 along Y-axis.

void ode::ODEWorld::step (  float  dt,
ODECollisionInterface *  checker
) 
 

Simulates time step.

Calls user specified collision checker to find out contacts between two objects.

Parameters:
dt Time step to simulate.
checker Collision checker to be used to find contacts. Pass 0 to use default.
